pages.text: $(bold)Purpose:$() Foliot Possession $(br2)$(thing)Hedyrin's Lure$() attracts $(thing)Foliot$() and forces them to possess a nearby creature. This pentacle does not lead to permanent imprisonment, the spirit and possessed creature will perish within a short period of time.

pages.title: Uses
pages.text: $(li)$(l:rituals/possession/possess_endermite)Possessed Endermite$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/possession/possess_skeleton)Possessed Skeleton$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_parrot)Parrot Familiar$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_greedy)Greedy Familiar$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_deer)Deer Familiar$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_blacksmith)Blacksmith Familiar$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_beaver)Beaver Familiar$(/l)$()
